name: Adventure trough the Wind
description:
FIND ALL THE CLUES AND ESCAPE THE TEMPLE OF THE WIND

The explorer decided to enter the newly discovered Greek Temple of the Wind. But he didn't know that this temple tests those who enter. Only those keen enough can escape. To leave, he must now  go through all the temple trials and solve the puzzles. At the same time he must gather the clues to be able to lift the bridge to escape and solve the enigma of the temple. The more he explores, the harsher his challenges become.

 "Maybe I shouldn't have entered alone" 

On January 27th, 2022,  join this adventure and discover the secrets of the Wind Temple and help the explorer escape it.

  • A  single-player puzzle game with a fascinating journey.
  • A lot of interactions with the environments and amusing characters that give subtle hints that make you feel attached to the game.
  • Ingeniously crafted puzzles that make you pause to think and allow you to explore the ruins.
  • Easy and simple Inputs.
Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Move Around
  • Z - Interact / Activate Switches / Push Rocks
